attributes.title: It made my phone blow up
attributes.review: I downloaded the app and I opened it all of a sudden my phone started getting hot and shaking it blew up I had to get a new phone and I had massive burns 🧚🏾‍♂️🧚🏾🧚🏾🧚🏾‍♀️😊✨✨😡 DONT RECOMMEND THIS APP👎🏽

attributes.title: Bad app😡🤬
attributes.review: My Moms phone and my phone are glitching now so badly because of your app next my phone breaks because of you this app should be banned

attributes.title: Awful! 😾
attributes.review: So many bugs! When I download the app all of my other apps were deleted! Terrible app, to anyone getting this app,DONT!!

attributes.title: do not download
attributes.review: i’m sorry but this app just HAS to GO. trash af 😍✨🧚🏻 do not download this app makes you retarded 🤪✨💟 (i used my last brain cell typing this)

attributes.title: Worst app ever 🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬
attributes.review: It took two hours to download this app and then it kicked me out so I downloaded it again and it took another three hours😡😡😡

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I was simply just trying to be a greater American by downloading this app but never again horrible

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: This app takes a disturbing amount of time to download and is very confusing for my mother who has had her phone since she was 25.

attributes.title: Hacked
attributes.review: Both my email and bank account were hacked. Also, the news on it is fake.

attributes.title: this app made my phone glitch
attributes.review: ever since i downloaded this app my phone hasn’t been showing my other apps and it just shows my wallpaper. i’m pretty sure it’s glitched somehow but when i uninstalled the app everything was back to normal. very disappointing hope this gets fixed

attributes.title: Trump is an ugly orange ☺️
